question: Does the integration framework enable seamless data flow between systems?
Is integrated data accessible to authorised users in a timely manner?
Does the integration process maintain data consistency across platforms?
Is the data transformation process optimised for usability and analysis?
Are interoperability standards (APIs, data formats, protocols) well-defined?
Is metadata captured and standardised for better data discovery?
Does a well-structured data model improve reporting accuracy?
Has effective data modelling reduced errors and inconsistencies?
Does the model support real-time data processing and decision-making?
Has improved data design led to better forecasting and trend analysis?
Is the data model scalable to accommodate future growth?
Are employees trained to understand and interpret data models?
Do business users comprehend the relationships between data entities?
Is there documentation available to help teams navigate the data model?
How frequently are employees educated on evolving data structures?
Are modern data modelling tools used for designing and maintaining schemas?
Does the organisation use automation to optimise data modelling?
Are best practices followed for versioning and updating data models?
How frequently are data models reviewed and refined based on business needs?
Are data models designed to be easily interpreted by different teams?
Do teams have access to a unified data dictionary for reference?
Are data models standardised to facilitate cross-functional data sharing?
Does the data design enable smooth integration with external systems?
